item.title: By: Brian K. McDonald

item.description: That is quite a bit of postings. Maybe I'll participate sometime soon. :) Thanks to all who made a post this T-SQL Tuesday! I am looking forward to next one.

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.description: The topic is picked by the person hosting each month. We usually find out about a week ahead of time. I believe Matt Velic is hosting in April 2011.
item.content:encoded: The topic is picked by the person hosting each month. We usually find out about a week ahead of time. I believe Matt Velic is hosting in April 2011.

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.content:encoded:
Congrats on an awesome turnout.

Where is it posted on what the subject matter will be for the month? i was doing some snooping but i couldn’t discern a place where i could go look to find out what the month’s topic would be (or has been).
